fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Energy, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Areas of interaction with EU institutions are: the Common Agricultural Policy with particular focus on sugar and ethanol; trade policy, with particular emphasis on preferential trade agreements; support for developing countries; energy policy; food and health issues.
relevant_communication: ProSunergy represents the Dominican Republic sugar producers on the London Sugar Group - the ACP/LDC Sugar Industries Group. The London Sugar Group provides expert commercial advice on sugar issues to the Ambassadors of the ACP Group in Brussels.
goals__remit:
ProSunergy conducts strategic analysis in sugar and renewable fuels. Main topics are farming practices, industrial processes, market and investment analysis, business development, trade and agricultural policy.  
Clients include farmer organisations, corporations and cooperatives, sugar industry organisations, governments and multilateral intergovernmental organisations.
